name: TIE Avenger (V)
Lore: 'Design based on Lord Vader''s prototype Advanced x1. Manufactured until replaced by the more economical TIE Interceptor. Equipped with deflector shields and a hyperdrive.',
Text: 'May add 1 pilot and 1 astromech.  While TIE Fighter Construction Facility on table, pilot is forfeit +2 and this starship may not be lost before the damage segment of battle.  May deploy an astromech aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
